short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Defund Mainstream Media, force them to change

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Is it even possible to defund Mainstream Media? Yes. Install this plugin and block the sites you are fed up with, so they can't profit from your visits. When millions of us have installed this plugin, advertisers will take notice. Only then, Mainstream Media will start to change.
